I've recently started using several of Themify's nifty themes for a couple of sites that I personally maintain. Many of their themes have a clean, minimalist look that resonates with me. And I also like their theme customization interface and their use of shortcodes to activate select content areas of my sites.

So take a look at their great portfolio of themes and if you do decide to purchase any one of their themes, I appreciate your using the following link as it is my affiliate link with Themify.
